column4: Can you upgrade to 7.10 using the CD instead of doing it through Updates?
I had 7.10 pre release and have updated from that but it seems my repository is broken :/
I got tribe 5 to do initial install
Yea my repos are messed up, so i downlaoded the CD instead and was wondering if you can upgrdae through that rather than through repos
what are the repos on the current gutsy 7.10 cd?
because compiz relies on emerald for window management
try alt + click to move them until you setup emeraldd
it won't let me install emerald, says i'm missing repos...what repos do i have to add? i don't remmeber ever adding any...
alt + click always works, something's seriously broke if it doesn't. Is your machine completely locked up?
everything works perfectly except for being able to move windows...however, if i disable compiz i CAN move windows (with alt click or by dragging them with the top bar)
try checking /etc/apt/sources.list and uncomment the repository where emerald would be
everything works perfectly except for being able to move windows...however, if i disable compiz i CAN move windows (with alt click or by dragging them with the top bar)
perhaps your missing something in xorg?
i'll try completely removing all compiz crap and reinstalling it completely
do you konw what repo emerald themes are downloaded from and all their dependencies? b/c it won't let me download
try gnome-looks site its pretty good
